summary: An Ordinance providing for the laying off, opening, widening, extending and establishing of North Forty-firth Street, from west line of Motor Line Addition to the City of Seattle, to Fremont Avenue, all in the City of Seattle; and providing for the condemnation, appropriation, taking and damaging of land and other property necessary therefor; and providing that the payment for such improvement be made by special assessment upon property specially benefited, in the manner provided by law.
